## Mutator.iconClick\_() method

Clicking on the icon toggles if the mutator bubble is visible. Disable if block is uneditable.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected iconClick_(e: MouseEvent): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | MouseEvent | Mouse click event. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
